product_name: eGear LED SplashFlash LED Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The eGear SplashFlash LED light offers bright and reliable illumination in a compact and waterproof design that's ideal for boating and other wet adventures. Bright, white LED is virtually unbreakable and features 25 lumens, steady-on and SOS flashing modes, 360deg visibility and a textured lens for broad, soft illumination. Light offers a run time of up to 11 hrs. in steady-on mode and 16 hrs. in SOS flashing mode. Impact-resistant ABS plastic housing is waterproof to IPX7 standards, which is immersion up to 1m for 30 min. Runs on a single AAA battery (included). Carabiner clip makes it easy to secure the eGear SplashFlash LED light. Closeout.
short_description: The eGear SplashFlash LED light offers bright and reliable illumination in a compact and waterproof design that's ideal for boating and other wet adventures.
